entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
